data.name: main pump
data.description: The main pump is responsible for watering plants, and providing nutrient solution. It runs on 110, and is controlled via relay.

data.name: exhaust fan
data.description: The main exhaust fan pulls hot air from the top of the cabinet. It runs on 12VDC, and is controlled by a multi-channel relay.

data.name: intake fan
data.description: The intake fan pulls cooler air into the bottom of the cabinet. It runs on 12VDC, and is controlled by a multi-channel relay.

data.name: overhead light
data.description: main overhead light. Bloomspec 600W. Runs on 110VAC. Controlled by a special relay.

data.name: ambient temp sensor
data.description: ambient air temp sensor. Operates on 1-wire interface. Defaults to pin 4.

data.name: mini transfer pump
data.description: A 12vdc mini submersible water pump. 63 GPH / 240 LPH. Max lift is spec'd at 3 Meters, with a pipe.

data.name: 5 gal tote
data.description: Reinforced stack-able 5 gal tote. Reinforced snap fit, and lockable
